entry.source: {F812}Announcer\0{F87A,138}{F813,1,406002}Our cameras in Kabuki-cho have{F801}spotted another run-in between a{F801}Hunter and a demon!{F801}{F802}The demon from the Red Team who{F801}faces off against the White Team's{F801}hardy Hunter is...{F801}{F802}The beautiful songstress of the{F801}Expanse who sings mysterious and{F801}magical melodies, Lorelei!{F801}
